# The bcmath extension

This extension provides Basic Calculator (BC) style precision math support.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_BCMATH

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_BCMATH_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.
